title: Love Again (Demo)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I never thought that I would find a way out
I never thought I'd hear my heart beating loud
I can't believe there's something left in my chest anymore
But goddamn, you got me in love again
[Pre-Chorus]
Touch me, take me to heaven, won't you?
Show me, you're looking so good on me
Never have I ever met somebody like you
Used to be afraid of love and what it might do
I never knew I had it in me to dance anymore
But goddamn, you got me in love again
[Chorus]
You got me in love again
You got me in love again
You got me in love again
Again
[Verse 2]
I used to think that I was made out of stone
I used to spend so many nights on my own
I never knew I had it in me to dance anymore
But goddamn, you got me in love again

[Pre-Chorus]
Touch me, take me to heaven, won't you?
Show me, you're looking so good on me
Never have I ever met somebody like you
Used to be afraid of love and what it might do
I never knew I had it in me to dance anymore
But goddamn, you got me in love again
[Chorus]
You got me in love again
You got me in love again
You got me in love again
Again
[Refrain]
I can't believe, I can't believe
I finally found the one
I'll sink my teeth in disbelief
That you're the human I want
I can't believe there's something left
Inside my chest anymore
But goddamn, you got me in love again
[Bridge]
La-la-la, la-la-la
La-la-la, la-la-la
I never thought that I would find a way out
I never thought I'd hear my heart beating loud
I can't believe there's something left in my chest anymore
But goddamn, you got me in love again
La-la-la, la-la-la
La-la-la, la-la-la (Oh)

[Refrain]
I can't believe, I can't believe
I finally found the one
I'll sink my teeth in disbelief
That you're the human I want
I can't believe there's something left
Inside my chest anymore
But goddamn, you got me in love again
[Chorus]
You got me in love again (Touch me, take me)
You got me in love again (Show me the way)
You got me in love again (Touch me, take me)
Again (Show me the way)
